note.p: Career: Reader in Helminthology, University of London; Helminthologist, London School of Tropical Medicine; Consultant Parasitologist, HM Forces, Egypt, 1915, Levant Base, 1916
Memberships: FZS; Hon Mem Helminthol Soc, Washington; Mem Corr Soc Pathol Exotique, Paris
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1970 vol 16 pp 385-404, plate, by P C C Garnham
